item.title: Indie Web
item.description: Here’s an attempt to join the indie web. Partly this is to play around with tech, partly because I want to see if I can write something interesting, and partly because there are 4 shouty kids nearby and I need to distract myself. First step is this - a simple hugo blog, a simple theme, hosted on github pages.
